name: Interview Ready
description: Master core Two Pointer patterns for interview success
objective: Recognize and solve standard Two Pointer problems confidently

problems.title: Two Sum II - Input Array is Sorted
problems.description: Find two numbers in sorted array that sum to target
learningObjectives: Apply pattern to sorted array optimization
Recognize Two Pointer opportunities in sum problems

problems.title: Valid Palindrome
problems.description: Check if string is palindrome using two pointers
learningObjectives: Apply two pointer pattern to strings

problems.title: Container With Most Water
problems.description: Find container that holds the most water
learningObjectives: Apply two pointers for optimization problems

problems.title: Move Zeroes
problems.description: Move all zeros to end while maintaining order

problems.title: 3Sum
problems.description: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
learningObjectives: Combine fixed element with two pointers
Scale two pointer to three elements
problems.milestoneDescription: Critical pattern that appears in 70% of multi-element problems

problems.title: Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array
problems.description: Remove duplicates in-place from sorted array
learningObjectives: Apply two pointers for in-place modification

problems.title: Sort Colors
problems.description: Sort array with three colors using Dutch flag algorithm

problems.title: Remove Nth Node From End of List
problems.description: Remove nth node from end of linked list in one pass
learningObjectives: Transfer two pointer pattern to linked lists
Apply pattern to different data structures

achievements.name: Lightning Fast
achievements.description: Complete foundation problems in under 30 minutes each

achievements.name: Pattern Spotter
achievements.description: Recognize Two Pointer patterns instantly (< 30 seconds)

achievements.name: First Try Master
achievements.description: Solve problems without hints on first attempt

achievements.name: Interview Ready
achievements.description: Master all Level 1 patterns with 80%+ accuracy

nextLevelPreview.name: Fluent Mastery
nextLevelPreview.description: Handle ALL Two Pointer variations with confidence
